perturbation.original_text:
INITIAL DISTRIBUTION      PERIOD:                    April 15, 2000 through October 15,
                                 2000 (6 Months from the Effective Date)
perturbation.changed_text:
INITIAL DISTRIBUTION      PERIOD:                    April 15, 2000 through October 15,
                                 2000 (Approximately 6 Months from the Effective Date)
perturbation.explanation: By changing '6 Months' to 'Approximately 6 Months', we introduce ambiguity. The contract specifies a fixed duration but the modification suggests it could vary, undermining the certainty needed for contractual obligations. This can lead to disputes regarding the exclusivity rights during the period.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clarity and Certainty of Terms

perturbation.original_text: EXCLUSIVE TERRITORIES:      The 48 Contiguous United States
perturbation.changed_text: EXCLUSIVE TERRITORIES:      The United States of America, with limited exceptions.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'The 48 Contiguous United States' to 'The United States of America, with limited exceptions', we create a contradiction. The original text clearly defines the exclusive territory, while the modified text is vague and introduces uncertainty. The original text provides clear geo boundaries, while the modification creates uncertainty and invites disputes over where COMWARE can sell the product.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clarity and Certainty of Terms

perturbation.original_text:
ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or
workmanship  for 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment
purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be
repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to
COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the
cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority
shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
perturbation.changed_text:
ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or
workmanship  for approximately 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment
purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within a reasonable time period will be
repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to
COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the
cost of returning the item to COMWARE by a standard shipping method.  express
shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specified a fixed warranty period of '3 years,' offering clarity and legal certainty. The modification replaces this with 'approximately 3 years' and 'reasonable time period' and 'standard shipping method', injecting ambiguity into the warranty's duration and shipping method. This vagueness can lead to disputes about when the warranty expires and what shipping method will be used for returned item, thereby weakening the enforceability of the warranty terms.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Warranty Law - Definite Terms and Conditions
